Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the mandatory revocation of an amusement arcade or gaming cafe license for offering cash prizes or engaging in other unlawful gambling activity.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Mandatory revocation of an amusement arcade or gaming cafe license for offering cash prizes or engaging in other unlawful gambling activity.

Items.Title: Oversight - Preventing Illegal Gambling in New York City’s Gaming Cafes .
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Preventing Illegal Gambling in New York City’s Gaming Cafes.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reducing the maximum fine amount for violations of vending regulations and defining unrelated violations of vending rules and regulations as separate offenses.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Reducing the maximum fine amount for violations of vending regulations and defining unrelated violations of vending rules and regulations as separate offenses.

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Mayors veto and disapproval message of Introductory Number 434-A, In relation to reducing the maximum fine amount for violations of vending regulations and defining unrelated violations of vending rules and regulations as separate offenses.
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Mayor's Veto - Int. No. 434-A, Reducing the maximum fine amount for violations of vending regulations and defining unrelated violations of vending rules and regulations as separate offenses.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reducing the maximum fine amount for violations of vending regulations and defining unrelated violations of vending rules and regulations as separate offenses.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Reducing the maximum fine amount for violations of vending regulations and defining unrelated violations of vending rules and regulations as separate offenses.

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Mayors veto and disapproval message of Introductory Number 434-A, In relation to reducing the maximum fine amount for violations of vending regulations and defining unrelated violations of vending rules and regulations as separate offenses.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Mayor's Message be Filed by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Mayor's Veto - Int. No. 434-A, Reducing the maximum fine amount for violations of vending regulations and defining unrelated violations of vending rules and regulations as separate offenses.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the mandatory revocation of an amusement arcade or gaming cafe license for offering cash prizes or engaging in other unlawful gambling activity.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Mandatory revocation of an amusement arcade or gaming cafe license for offering cash prizes or engaging in other unlawful gambling activity.

Items.Title: Oversight - Preventing Illegal Gambling in New York City’s Gaming Cafes .
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
